snippet.title: Casual Sport Series: Hockey - Official Gameplay Trailer | Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, Steam
snippet.description:
Grab your controller, hit the ice, and prove you've got what it takes to score big! Step onto the ice and experience hockey like never before in Casual Sport Series: Hockey! - up to 4 players in local multiplayer.

The game is coming to Nintendo Switch,  Sony PlayStation, Microsoft Xbox and Steam on 11th October 2024.

Pre-Order Now:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/casual-sport-series-hockey-switch

Wishlist Now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2936440/Casual_Sport_Series_Hockey/
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/casual-sport-series-hockey/9nvp8sqd3zvk
https://store.playstation.com/en-pl/concept/10012346/
